alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 12:32AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Webster, northeastern Christian and southeastern Greene Counties through 100 AM CST... At 1231 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Springfield to near Rogersville to 6 miles southwest of Fordland. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Springfield, Ozark, Marshfield, Rogersville, Strafford, Fordland, Niangua, Diggins, Turners, Linden, Galloway and Northview. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 84 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for southwestern Missouri.
